short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension silences audio ads from specific websites, with current support limited to AccuRadio.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Elevate your online audio streaming experience with the Audio Ad Silencer extension, an efficient solution to silence intrusive audio ads, starting with AccuRadio and expanding to more sites in the future.

Key Features:

- Ad-Free Listening: Enjoy your favorite music and content on AccuRadio without interruptions from audio ads.
- User-Friendly: Easy to install and activate, it runs in the background without needing manual input.
- Lightweight and Efficient: Designed to have minimal impact on your browser's performance, ensuring a smooth browsing experience.
- Future-Proof: We are committed to updating the extension to support more websites based on user feedback and demand.

How It Works:

Once installed, the Audio Ad Blocker automatically detects and blocks audio ads on supported sites, ensuring an uninterrupted listening experience. No configuration is needed; simply add the extension to your browser, and start enjoying your favorite music ad-free.

Coming Soon:

We are continuously working to expand the list of supported websites. Stay tuned for updates and new features based on user feedback.
